snippet: A program by the Yale University School of Medicine and 2U, an education technology company, is to offer the same Ivy League degree online that is available on campus.
abstract: Yale University School of Medicine and education technology company 2U are denied accreditors' permission to offer physician assistant masters degree online; incident highlights hurdles to getting online classes accredited, especially for prestigious degrees that require hands-on training.
lead_paragraph: A program by the Yale University School of Medicine and 2U, an education technology company, is to offer the same Ivy League degree online that is available on campus.

headline.main: Yale Medical School’s Request to Expand Campus Program Online Is Denied
headline.print_headline: Yale Medical School’s Request to Expand Campus Program Online Is Denied
